text: pinne a matilinre karyam: at a pattanattile rant anathakkuttikalutetan. atinatiyil avarkkayi karutivecca oru nidhiyunt. avarute pitav nallearu manusyanayirunnu. atinal avariruvarum prayapurttiyetti tannalute nidhi purattetukkanamenn ninre nathan agrahiccu. iteakkeyum ninre nathanre anugrahamatre. nanenre svantam hitamanusaricc ceytatalla iteannum. tankalkku ksamikkan kaliyatirunna karyannalute pearulitan.â€
